channel.title: A couple of questions
channel.description:
I am kind of new to coding and am making a server. I know how to do pretty much everything else except add commands. I downloaded a DefaultServer so everything is blank pretty much. If someone could tell me where to put the code for the commands that would be great. I can make commands but I don't know where to put them.
I was also wondering how I can fix the hair through helmet bug. I found a topic telling how to do that but it seemed poorly written and wasn't the least bit of help. So if someone could direct me to a topic on how to do this or tell me that would be great.
Thanks.

item.title: A couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Few item types for equipping ,Helm will show beard Fullmask Doesn't!

that means change ur items on how they equip =P
experiment=P so put the helms on fullmask and try it =P or hats and see =P

Read full topic
